name: Printing
content: The print command System.out.println("Hello world"); prints the text "Hello world."

You can print any text you want with the command, as long as the command System.out.println("text"); -i.e., System dot out dot println open parenthesis ( "the text" close parenthesis ) and semicolon ; remains unchanged.
The command below will print the text "Hello {VAR=USERNAME}!".
